title: Luxury apartment for sale in Colombo 3
details:
-Flooring: Marble glazed porcelain tile finish or Timber wooden floor finish (* Condition Apply).
-Doors: All doors will be high quality European standard, polished solid doors, except bathrooms.
-Windows: Rust proof & powder coated aluminum folding windows with clear glass.
-Air Conditioning: Spilt type Air Conditioners provided for all bed rooms and living room.
-Light Fittings: Imported LED light fittings such as wall lamps, ceiling lamps and chandelier lamps with highly efficient switches.
-Television: TV provisions for living area and master bedroom will be provided with one LED TV.
-Telephone System: Fiber to the home (FTTH) solution will be provided, including Telephone, Intercom, High Speed Broadband & IP TV
-Wardrobe: Built-in wooden wardrobe for Master bedroom.
-A luxurious front lobby including visitor lounge.
-Swimming pool, Separated kids pool with changing room in the rooftop.
-Functional hall.
-Fully equipped gym facilities.
